review: I was highly satisfied with the doctor. She gives sufficient time to listen all health related problems and makes patient comfortable. Further, doctor explains each and every observations. The medicine prescribed was in limited quantity with good understanding of salts. Only related and relevant blood checks are prescribed. This is again a good point. Even test results are explained for better understanding. In case of any other queries subsequently also, you can approach doctor. Consultation fees in very reasonable. I along with my family is a regular visitor to doctors since last one year and so. I recommend all to have a positive experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I took my Nani to Dr Paru, she has been very polite and helpful. She checked my Nani, asked several questions regarding the problems my Nani was facing.
She was very thorough with the checkup and prescribed medications that were suitable for an 82-year-old woman (no heavy medications or anything), some doctors have a tendency to inflate small matters and forcefully prescribe various test but that is not the case here. 
Dr Sharma specifically mentioned that Nani's problems were not that big so she won't be prescribing unnecessary test. 

Medicines prescribed were also readily available. 

Thank you, Doctor :)

Dr. PARU SHARMA was the best suited Dr for my treatment  on 1st Day doase I recovered from fever and loose motion...She recommended few test that I need to share with Dr soon...thank you, Dr. I would recommend Dr Paru to my family and friends without any single question...
